Mementomori

Description

This is a web application that provides online shopping mall service. We signed a contract with Mementomori which is a clothing shopping mall company, and worked on it for 4 months. Three developers participated in this project, and I was in charged of frontend development.

Main Task

Developed HTML layouts and Javascript functions

Skills

HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Achievement

Completed the contract
